name: amazona
description: 1. `cd backend`    2. run `npm i`, `npm start`    3. make sure that connected to mongodb    4. open the link `http://localhost:5000/api/seed`    5. `cd frontend`    6. run `npm i`, `npm start`    7. it opens the link `http://localhost:3000/`

scripts.build: cd backend && npm install  && cd ../frontend && npm install && npm run build
